--0-1812586972-1267380739=:15675
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I am trying to fetch pages from xing: 

http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/
# Heritrix added seed redirect from http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/.
http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/index.html.gzHeritrix add the redirect page /the gzip version of the seed-url) automatically to the seeds. But it seems that the HTMLExtractor don't work for pages that are gzip. Therefore heritrix is not able to follow the links. Is there a way to follow the links with heritrix?

Thanks for answers,
 Christian



      
--0-1812586972-1267380739=:15675
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman,new york,times,serif;font-size:12pt">I am trying to fetch pages from xing: <br><pre><span><a target="_blank" href="http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/">http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/</a></span><br><span># Heritrix added seed redirect from <a target="_blank" href="http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/">http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/</a>.</span><br><span><a target="_blank" href="http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/index.html.gz">http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/index.html.gz</a></span></pre>Heritrix add the redirect page /the gzip version of the seed-url) automatically to the seeds. But it seems that the HTMLExtractor don't work for pages that are gzip. Therefore heritrix is not able to follow the links. Is there a way to follow the links with heritrix?<br><br>Thanks for
 answers,<br> Christian<br>
</div><br>
